commandDescription: Generates release defintion based on the artifacts installed in a org
releaseNameFlagDescription: Name of the release definition file, ideally the same name generated by changelog
changelogbranchrefDescrption: Branch where releasechangelog.json exists, use when name should be auto generated
branchNameFlagDescription: Repository branch in which the release defintion files are to be written
showAllArtifactsFlagDescription: Show all artifacts in changelog markdown, including those that have not changed in the release
pushFlagDescription: Push the changelog to a repository to the provided branch
forcePushFlagDescription: Force push changes to the repository branch
generateReleaseDescription: Generate a release definition automatically based on the packages installed in the org
